thread.title: Jim Mattis Says U.S. Isn’t in Iraq to Take Its Oil - WSJ
thread.title_full: Jim Mattis Says U.S. Isn’t in Iraq to Take Its Oil - WSJ

author: Gordon Lubold
title: Jim Mattis Says U.S. Isn’t in Iraq to Take Its Oil - WSJ
text:
BAGHDAD—Jim Mattis, on his first trip to Iraq as defense secretary, said he plans to assess the fight against Islamic State in the country and that the U.S. isn’t there to take its oil.

“I think all of us here in this room, all of us in America, have paid for our gas and oil all along and I’m sure that we will continue to do so in the future,” he told reporters in Abu Dhabi the day before leaving for Iraq. “We are not in Iraq to... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
